data.title: Contact Us
data.text:
Mailing Address

First-Year and Transfer Applicants

Office of Admissions

San Diego State University

5500 Campanile Drive

San Diego, CA 92182-7455*

Graduate Applicants

Graduate Admissions

San Diego State University

5500 Campanile Drive

San Diego, CA 92182-8225*

*When you send us mail, please include the last four digits of the ZIP code to ensure your mail arrives directly to the Office of Admissions.

Office Hours

The Prospective Student Center is located in Student Services West, at the base of the clock tower.

In-Person

Now - Friday, August 30: Monday - Friday, 9 a.m.-12 p.m. PDT

September 3 - December 11: Monday - Friday, 9 a.m.-2:30 p.m. PDT

December 12 - 31: Monday - Friday, 9 a.m.-12 p.m. PDT

Prospective Student Center

Phone

Monday - Friday, 9-11 a.m. PDT

(619) 594-6336

Virtual

Now - Friday, August 30:Monday - Friday, 1-4 p.m. PDT*

September 3 - December 31: Monday - Friday, 2-4 p.m. PDT

*Not available, Wednesday, August 21

Meet with an Admissions Counselor

Office Closures

Due to campus holidays, this office will be closed on the following dates:

2024: January 1, January 15, April 1, May 27, June 19, July 4, September 2, November 11, November 28–29, December 24–27

2025: January 1, January 20, March 31, May 26, June 19, July 4, September 1, November 11, November 27–28, December 23–26
